title: The Chase
creator_contributor_role: Over Newton Anglican Community College, production facilities
abstract: An animated story of a fly and the perils of animal life
description: A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival. A fly is desperately fleeing from being eaten by a bird. As he is manically tring to escape, he thinks his time is up when he comes across a frog. Luckily for the fly, the frog is more interested in eating the bird! Just when the fly thinks he is saved from death, SPLAT!! on the windscreen of a moving car.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B1006675; Diegesis Festival 2004. Program 2; Active; 2004
